snippet: The romantic story "Children of a Lesser God," which has been a hit already onstage and on film, is heading back to Broadway....

headline.print_headline: 'Children of a Lesser God' Heads to Broadway
headline.main: 'Children of a Lesser God' Heads to Broadway

lead_paragraph: The romantic story "Children of a Lesser God," which has been a hit already onstage and on film, is heading back to Broadway.
